buffs.description: Increases Elf Tribe Friendliness. 40 for every 5-star and 80 for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when the unit is in Time Shop. The Tribe Friendliness increased by the Forest Knight cannot exceed 1,000.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness (Elf)

buffs.description: Ancient Blessing: Increases the Ancient Blessings by 50. (Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and are stackable. However, Ancient Blessings increased by the [Forest Knight] cannot exceed 4,000.
buffs.name: Ancient Blessing

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it Increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily Grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack power by 10%.
Increases the movement speed of all units by 7%, and the critical damage of all units by 9%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Tribe Friendliness for Elf can be increased up to 1,500 by Forest Knight.

Increase Efficiency for Token Enhancement (Elf): The efficiency for Token Enhancement (Elf) is increased. Increase Tribe Friendliness by 40 for each 5-star, 100 for each 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop.
Ancient Blessings increase by 75 for each Forest Knight and by 150 for each Senior Forest Knight. The MAX amount of Ancient Blessings from Forest Knight increased from 2,000 to 4,000.
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Forest Knight ]
